CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 谈话；交谈；说；讲述；（会）讲（某种语言）；发言；演讲；（不用言语）表明；显示；代表…讲话，充当…的代言人；（发言或写作中）提到；谈及；以…方式说；表达（思想、观点）；（乐器或其他物体）发出特有响声

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 演讲的；富于表情的，雄辩的
可说出口的；可以交谈的
演讲者；扬声器；说话者；说某种语言的人
说话（speak的过去分词）；为…装轮辐

word_mean_info__list.difference: 较正式用词，通常指用明确的语言或文字着重地叙述事实，既强调内容又注重语气。
侧重于说话动作的本身，着重说话的能力而不在内容，可以是长篇大论的演讲，也可以是三言两语的交谈，甚至指简单的开口发声说话。
最普通常用词，指用语言表达思想，着重所说的内容。
普通用词，指把某事告诉或讲述给某人听，口语或书面语均可用。
着重说话的行为，常指声音的使用，突出用噪子发声。
普通用词，侧重指与人交谈时的连续说话，可指单方面较长谈话，和speak一样，着重说活动作而不侧重内容。

word_group.brief_definition: 大声一点说, 坦诚地说, 公开地说出
一般来说；一般而言；一般说来
(和所有类似事物比较)相对而言
含义深刻；意味深长；有力地证明
心平气和地说；平静地说
容许我打个譬喻；可以说

bilingual.target: 那为什么爱丽不能说话？

bilingual.source: The man asked me not to speak.
bilingual.target: 那个男人叫我不要说话。
你好。我可以和杰克说话吗？
我不能说话，我的喉咙疼。

list.abstract: speak（英[spiːk]，美[spiːk]），英语单词，动词，意思为说话；讲话；责备。短语搭配有speak up for（为…辩护；支持），例句为“Most people in Hong Kong speak Min.（大多数中国香港人都说闽南语。）” speak不及物动词类近义词有tongue、fack，及物动词类近义词有take the floor、to address，过去式为spoke，过去分词为spoken，名词形式为speaking、speaker。
《speak》是美国偶像歌手林赛·罗韩的首张录音室处女大碟，发行于2004年12月7日。 该专辑共收录12首歌曲，于2004年在美国公告牌达到第四号顶峰，公告牌的第一周销售为261762册，更突破了1500000张的销售记录，被美国唱片工业认证评为白金唱片。

yingyinNormal.en: And yet, you can't speak to women.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可你还是不敢和女人说话。

yingyinNormal.en: I need to speak to your supervising...
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要跟你的上级说话。

yingyinNormal.en: May I speak to you for a second, Mr. Gardner?
yingyinNormal.zh: 能借一步说话吗？加德纳先生。

yingyinNormal.en: Though I couldn't speak, I held up nine fingers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不能说话，我举起九个手指。

yingyinNormal.en: Whatever happened to "don't speak until spoken to"?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不说话，没人当你是哑巴？

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I think I speak for everyone when I say:
yingyinNormal.zh: 那么，我应该替大伙说话了：....

yingyinNormal.en: I need to speak to someone in position of authority.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要找你们最有份量的人说话。

yingyinNormal.en: You first learn to speak by interacting with your parents.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第一次学说话时，是借由和父母互动。

yingyinNormal.en: Lumie, I can't speak. It's all right, Cogsworth. I can't…
yingyinNormal.zh: 卢米亚，我不能说话了。没关系，葛士华。我不能…

yingyinNormal.en: Sir, I am a co... Mime! She's a mime. This mime can not speak. You can't speak if you're a mime.
yingyinNormal.zh: 先生，我是警...哑剧演员！她是哑剧演员，哑剧演员不能说话，你是哑剧演员，你不能说话。

yingyinNormal.en: And I don't wanna speak to you. Not now, not ever.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不想和你说话了，现在不想，一辈子都不想了。

yingyinNormal.en: You're trying to stall. You refusing to speak to your leader?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是在拖延。你不想跟你的领袖说话吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Before we learned to read and write, we learned to speak.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在我们学会阅读和书写前，我们先学会说话。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm Princess Peppa. You must bow when you speak to me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是佩奇公主，你和我说话的时候，记得要鞠躬。

yingyinNormal.en: Excuse me, but I don't need to be stirred or squashed. The facts speak for themselves.
yingyinNormal.zh: 抱歉，我不需要扇动或逼迫，事实会说话的。

yingyinNormal.en: Can I speak to Goodie please? It's Peppa. For you. I miss you too, Goodie.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我可以和金金说话吗？是佩奇，给你！我好想你，金金。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, you need to start raising your hand before you speak. Yes, starting now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 下次你想说话时必须先举手。是的，从现在开始。

yingyinNormal.en: This is David Kim, I need to speak to Detective Rosemary Vick. Oh, Mr. Kim.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是大卫·金，我需要和罗丝玛莉·维克说话。哦，金先生。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't want to speak to the FBI. Why not? I'm brown and I talk funny.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不想跟联邦调查局的人说话。为什么？我是棕色人种而且口音搞笑。

yingyinNormal.en: Hello, Granny. Can I speak to Goodie please? It's Peppa. For you. I miss you too, Goodie.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你好，奶奶，我可以和金金说话吗？是佩奇，给你！我好想你，金金。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 说话者；议长；演讲者；做讲座者；讲某种语言的人
n. 辐条；轮辐；舵轮把柄；伞骨
n. 说话；讲话；谈话；演讲

word_family.mean: v. 说话；讲话；责备；劝告；表明；显示；发出特有的响声；发言；交谈；谈话

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 大声说；坦诚地说；公开地说出
一般来说；一般而言；一般说来
含义深刻；意味深长；有力地证明

sense_info_list.en: to talk to sb. about sth.; to have a conversation with sb.

examination_example.sentence: He suggested that preretirees should <highlight>speak</highlight> with a financial adviser to set long-term financial goals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他建议退休前的人应该和财务顾问谈谈，制定长期的财务目标。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Speaking</highlight> with your children before you make a real estate decision is wise.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在做一个真正的房产决定之前，和你的孩子谈谈是明智的。

examination_example.sentence: Parents can get a lot out of using their devices to <highlight>speak</highlight> to a friend or get some work out of the way.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 父母们可以使用设备与朋友交流或完成工作，并从中受益良多。

sense_info_list.en: the language or jargon of a particular group, organization or subject

examination_example.sentence: Office <highlight>speak</highlight> can help you figure out how you relate to your work—and how your work defines who you are.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 办公室语言可以帮助你弄明白你和你的工作的关系，以及你的工作又是如何定义你的。

examination_example.sentence: But this seems to be the irony of office <highlight>speak</highlight>: Everyone makes fun of it, but managers love it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但这似乎是办公室用语的讽刺之处：每个人都取笑它，但经理们却喜欢它。

examination_example.sentence: Which of the following statements is true about office <highlight>speak</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于办公室谈话，下列哪个陈述是正确的?

sense_info_list.en: to use your voice to say sth.

examination_example.sentence: Deep breaths can help, as can <highlight>speaking</highlight> more slowly and deliberately.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 深呼吸可以帮助你，从容不迫的表达也可以帮助你。

examination_example.sentence: In plays, novels and narrative poems, characters <highlight>speak</highlight> as constructs created by the author.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在戏剧、小说和叙事诗中，人物都是按照作者创造的结构说话。

examination_example.sentence: Generally <highlight>speaking</highlight>, the author's attitude toward gene patenting is objective.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 总的来说，作者对基因专利的态度是客观的。

sense_info_list.en: to say what you think clearly and freely, especially in order to support or defend sb./sth.

examination_example.sentence: When you do <highlight>speak</highlight> up, don't assume the link will be clear.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你明确表态时，不要假定两者之间的联系会很明显。

examination_example.sentence: How do you decide whether it's worth <highlight>speaking</highlight> up?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你如何决定它是否值得明确表态?

sense_info_list.en: show or express something without using words

examination_example.sentence: These gardens <highlight>speak</highlight> of various other fundamental urges, beyond that of decoration and creative expression.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除了装饰和创造性表达，这些花园还表明了其他各种各样的基本需求。

examination_example.sentence: Two years ago, Rupert Murdoch's daughter, Elisabeth, <highlight>spoke</highlight> of the "unsettling dearth of integrity across so many of our institutions."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 两年前，鲁珀特·默多克的女儿伊丽莎白谈到“我们许多机构缺乏诚信令人不安”。

examination_example.sentence: His attempts to make his way up the promotion ladder <highlight>speak</highlight> volumes about British society.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他在晋升阶梯上的努力充分显示了英国社会。

sense_info_list.en: to be able to use a particular language
give a formal talk to a group of people

word_usage.usage:
表示“说，讲”时：
speak用作不及物动词时，侧重说话的动作而非内容，用作及物动词时，其宾语常为某种语言。
say是普通用词，指用语言表达思想，侧重于所说的具体内容，通常用作及物动词。
talk用作不及物动词时，侧重指与人交谈时的连续说话，强调说话的动作而非内容，用作及物动词时，宾语多为nonsense、business等。
tell指直接给某人讲述或以间接的方式转述某事，有时有嘱托、命令之意，常后接双宾语或复合宾语。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 说话者；议长；演讲者；做讲座者；讲某种语言的人

word_family.mean: v. 说话；讲话；责备；劝告；表明；显示；发出特有的响声；发言；交谈；谈话

examination_example.sentence: Employees have the power to <highlight>speak</highlight> up, give feedback, disagree and discuss problems in real time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 员工有权畅所欲言，给予反馈，提出异议，并实时讨论问题。

examination_example.sentence: How confident they felt in their job, how comfortable they were to <highlight>speak</highlight> up in the workplace.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们对自己的工作有多自信，他们在工作场所畅所欲言有多自在。

examination_example.sentence: Popular culture makes people want to look popular, and act and <highlight>speak</highlight> like popular people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 流行文化使人们想要看起来受欢迎，行为和说话都像受欢迎的人。

sense_info_list.en: give a formal talk to a group of people

examination_example.sentence: Hawking was <highlight>speaking</highlight> at the opening of the Leverhulme Centre for the Future of Intelligence (LCFI) at Cambridge University.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 霍金在剑桥大学Leverhulme智能未来中心（LCFI）的开幕式上发表讲话。

sense_info_list.en: show or express something without using words

examination_example.sentence: Economically <highlight>speaking</highlight>, are we better off than we were ten years ago? Twenty years ago?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从经济上来看，我们比十年前过得更好了吗？跟二十年之前相比呢？

word_usage.usage: 当表示说某种语言时，要用speak，不可用say。

speak不可以接从句作宾语。如：
他没有说他住哪儿。
误 He didn't speak where he lived.
正 He didn't say where he lived.

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 大声一点说；坦诚地说；公开地说出

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 说话者；议长；演讲者；做讲座者；讲某种语言的人
n. 说话；讲话；谈话；演讲

word_family.mean: v. 说话；讲话；责备；劝告；表明；显示；发出特有的响声；发言；交谈；谈话

examination_example.sentence: We <highlight>speak</highlight> a decimal language because an ancestral tongue, proto-Indo-European, was decimally based.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们使用十进制语言是因为祖先的语言，即原始印欧语系，就是以十进制为基础的。

examination_example.sentence: But for <highlight>speaking</highlight>, there really is no substitute for trying to speak and use the language in a relaxed atmosphere.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是对于说话来说，在轻松的气氛中说话和使用语言是无可替代的。

examination_example.sentence: So I think that is really the challenge for people who live in a country where their target language isn't <highlight>spoken</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以我认为，对于生活在一个目标语言没有被使用的国家的人来说，这确实是一个挑战。

sense_info_list.en: give a formal talk to a group of people

examination_example.sentence: Hundreds of women <highlight>spoke</highlight> up about their own experience with emotional labor: the duties that are expected of them, but go unnoticed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 数百名女性讲述了她们自己的情绪劳动经历：人们期望她们履行的职责，但却无人问津。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Speaking</highlight> ahead of the All Energy Conference, ScottishPower chief executive Keith Anderson said: "We have a large supply of renewable energy."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 苏格兰电力公司首席执行官基思·安德森在全能源大会召开前表示：“我们有大量的可再生能源供应。”

examination_example.sentence: Jody Harubbaerd is a diet and nutrition expert who travels around the state to <highlight>speak</highlight> in middle and high schools.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Jody Harubbaerd 是一位饮食和营养专家，他周游全州，在中学和高中演讲。

sense_info_list.en: show or express something without using words

word_usage.usage:
speak不可以接从句作宾语。如：
他没有说他住哪儿。
误 He didn't speak where he lived.
正 He didn't say where he lived.
当表示说某种语言时，要用speak，不可用say。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: (和所有类似事物比较)相对而言

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 说话者；议长；演讲者；做讲座者；讲某种语言的人
adj. 以某种方式说话的
n. 说话；讲话；谈话；演讲

word_family.mean: v. 说话；讲话；责备；劝告；表明；显示；发出特有的响声；发言；交谈；谈话

examination_example.sentence: Yet, the only one who cares about any mistake is the one who is <highlight>speaking</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，唯一在乎错误的人是说话的人。

examination_example.sentence: So, don't stop <highlight>speaking</highlight> when you make a mistake unless it's a truly serious one.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以，当你犯错误时不要停止说话，除非是真正严重的错误。

examination_example.sentence: I was afraid to <highlight>speak</highlight> in front of a large group of people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我不敢在一大群人面前讲话。

examination_example.sentence: We <highlight>spoke</highlight> our own language.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们说自己的语言。

examination_example.sentence: We all <highlight>spoke</highlight> the same language of passes and shots.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于传球和投篮，我们都说同样的语言。

examination_example.sentence: We did not <highlight>speak</highlight> the local language, did not know the customs, and more often than not, did not entirely recognize the food.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们不会说当地的语言，不了解当地的习俗，而且通常情况下，我们不是很了解当地的食物。

examination_example.sentence: "Otherwise, I would never <highlight>speak</highlight> to another person for weeks on end," she said.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “否则，我就不会连续几个星期和别人说话，”她说。

examination_example.sentence: Hello, can I <highlight>speak</highlight> to Mr.Stone, please?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你好，请问Stone先生在吗？

examination_example.sentence: Why does the woman <highlight>speak</highlight> of a study?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么女人会提到研究？

examination_example.sentence: The damage is usually more serious on the first plant, but the neighbors, relatively <highlight>speaking</highlight>, stay safer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第一座核电站的破坏通常更严重，但相对而言，相邻的核电站更安全。

examination_example.sentence: In the coming months, we are bringing together artists from all over the globe, to enjoy <highlight>speaking</highlight> Shakespeare's plays in their own language.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在接下来的几个月里，我们将把来自世界各地的艺术家聚集在一起，享受用他们自己的语言讲述莎士比亚戏剧的乐趣。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 以某种方式说话的
n. 说话者；议长；演讲者；做讲座者；讲某种语言的人
n. 辐条；轮辐；舵轮把柄；伞骨
n. 说话；讲话；谈话；演讲

word_family.mean: v. 说话；讲话；责备；劝告；表明；显示；发出特有的响声；发言；交谈；谈话

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 大声一点说；坦诚地说；公开地说出
心平气和地说；平静地说

examination_example.sentence: The teacher <highlight>spoke</highlight> so quickly that almost everything he said flew right over my head.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 老师讲得太快了，几乎他说的每一句话我都听不懂。

examination_example.sentence: Worries in life will be reduced if you <highlight>speak</highlight> out to your close friend.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你对你的好友坦诚倾诉，生活中的烦恼就会减少。

examination_example.sentence: When people <highlight>speak</highlight> calmly to one another, they feel happy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当人们心平气和地交谈时，他们会感到快乐。

sense_info_list.en: give a formal talk to a group of people

examination_example.sentence: Some of us take social risks, such as <highlight>speaking</highlight> in front of a large group of people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们中的一些人承担社会风险，比如在一大群人面前发言。

examination_example.sentence: He takes part in group work and he is not afraid to <highlight>speak</highlight> any more.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他参加团队工作，不再害怕发言。

examination_example.sentence: He <highlight>spoke</highlight> at the conference about the charity work that he had done in the past few years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他在会议上谈到了他过去几年所做的慈善工作。

word_usage.usage: 当表示说某种语言时，要用speak，不可用say。

speak不可以接从句作宾语。如：
他没有说他住哪儿。
误 He didn't speak where he lived.
正 He didn't say where he lived.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 最普通用词，指用语言表达思想，着重所说的具体内容。
侧重于说话的动作本身，着重说话的能力而非内容。可指长篇演讲，也可指三言两语的交谈，或指简单的开口发声说话。
较正式用词，通常指用明确的语言或文字着重地叙述事实，既强调内容又注重语气。
普通用词，多指与人交谈时的连续说话，也可指单方面的较长谈话，和speak一样，着重说活的动作而不侧重内容。
普通用词，指将某事向某人讲述或转述，有时含嘱托、命令之意，口语或书面语均可用。
